10.1.0: Page Cache: Add an option to include secondary customer groups in the cache key
Fix install when used with Theme Origin
10.0.10: Page Cache: Handle hook actionCategoryUpdate which is not called correctly by StoreCommander
Page Cache: Fix ps_versions_compliancy for PS1.6 and PS1.5
10.0.9: Page Cache: Improve compatibility with module lgcookieslaw by Línea Gráfica and cache-warmer
10.0.8: Page Cache: Handle old hook actionProductUpdate for StoreCommander
Page Cache: Fix a bug concerning advanced configuration of the cache for user groups
10.0.7: Page Cache: Enable cache for Smartblog module (ClassyDevs)
10.0.6: Page Cache: Fix a problem with old version (<5) of pm_advancedsearch4 module (Presta-Module)
10.0.4: Page Cache: Improve compatibility with groupinc by Idnovate
Page Cache: Compatibility with module 'Promokit Amp' (pkamp) version 4
Page Cache: Handle a specific case where context->customer is not null but is not a customer
10.0.3: Speed Pack: Handle error if Page Cache Ultimate is not completely removed
10.0.2: Use json_encode/json_decode instead of serialize/unserialize as requested by Addons
10.0.1: Page Cache: Set HTML minification to disabled by default to encourage testing before activation
10.0.0: WEBP: AVIF format conversion is now available on PHP 8.1+ with AVIF support – faster, lighter, better!
Page Cache: HTML and inline CSS are now automatically minified on PHP 7+ – smaller cache (about -10%), faster load times.
The module is now using the Prestashop coding rules
Translations into Spanish, Italian, Polish and Portuguese
WEBP: Small fix for multi-domain shops
9.6.3: Page Cache: Force the browser cache to be disabled in static cache when it is disabled in module configuration
9.6.2: Page Cache: Make $cookies_to_preserve protected instead of private
9.6.1: Page Cache: Compress pagecache_cachekey_usergroups value to fix a problem with shop having thousands of user groups
Page Cache: Use Module::fetch() instead of Module::display() to avoid error with open_basedir restrictions
9.6.0: SQL Profiler: Use our specific version of greenlion/php-sql-parser, not the one provided by Prestashop
Page Cache: Don't check Apache optimisation if using nginx server
Page Cache: Add an advanced option to disable the cache when coming from a specific referer (usefull when using a SSO)
9.5.10: Page Cache: Make sure the cache_key has a uniq index
9.5.9: Page Cache: Fix to store the correct referer in traffic source
9.5.8: Page Cache: Fix an issue concerning the cache-warmer. I reset of the cache is recommended after the upgrade (red button under the statistics table).
Page Cache: Fix missing URL parameter 'dbgpagecache' when testing on some shops
9.5.7: Page Cache: Optimize the creation of the list of URLs to generate by the Cache-Warmer
Page Cache: Now handle very long URLs
9.5.6: Page Cache: Fixes a bug in version 9.5.5 for new install
9.5.5: Page Cache: Add a missing index for the Cache-Warmer
9.5.4: Page Cache: Improve a slow SQL query
9.5.3: Page Cache: Improve v9.5.0 upgrade script
9.5.2: Page Cache: Fix statistics count on pages having URL parameters
9.5.1: Page Cache: Make sure there is no duplicate before creating the UNIQUE index on cache_key
9.5.0: Page Cache: Improve performances and reduce database size
Page Cache: Improve handling of long URLs and case sensitivity in URLs
Page Cache: Reduce the number of deletions and insertions in the backlinks table to prevent deadlocks
Page Cache: Add a primary key to backlinks table

9.4.19: Page Cache: Add a lock in triggerReffreshment() to improve speed and avoid dead locks

9.4.15: Page Cache: Compatibility with module cm_cookielaw by caleydon.com
9.4.13: Page Cache: Improve compatibility with cookiesplus module by Idnovate (creates less context)

9.4.11: Page Cache: Googlebots and maybe other bots provide suspicious performances timing so we ignore them.

Check product quantity to know how we should refresh the cache on order validation
Fix a bug with _PS_BASE_URL_ which is not defined in some cases
2.5: Fix random number at bottom of cached pages
2.3: Add a debug mode to be able to test on production site
2.2: Fix a 'white page' issue when module is disabled
2.0: Hit statistics to know how the cache is efficient
Improve cache management by deleting cache files only when necessary (you can modify how cache is refreshed)
Now compatible with CloudCache (do not override same methods anymore)
Save cache files in multiple directories to avoid filesystems to slow down
Enable auto-update so you can update your module from your backoffice
Fix an issue with prices-drop, new-products and best-sales controllers
Fix an issue with default empty cookie name which is now a random name and expires immediately
1.7: Add default configuration for dynamic modules and a button to go back to this default configuration
1.6: Hook class updated to merge with version 1.5.4.1
Disable cache and display an error if tokens are enabled
1.5: Keep 'id_lang' cookie to be compatible with some modules
